title: List of association football stadiums by country
text:
This is a list of major <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="stadium">stadium</a>s, grouped by country and ordered by <a href="Seating%20capacity">capacity</a>. It does not include <a href="American%20Football">American Football</a> stadiums in the USA that are also used for association football.
Australia.
Note that many of the Australian stadiums are multi-purpose venues. Of those listed, only <a href="Hindmarsh%20Stadium">Coopers Stadium</a> in <a href="Adelaide">Adelaide</a>, <a href="South%20Australia">South Australia</a> is a soccer-specific venue.
<a href="A-League%23Clubs">A-League</a> venues (<a href="2014%E2%80%9315%20A-League">2014–15</a>):
Austria.
Arnold Schwarzenegger Stadion ex Prater Stadium
South Africa.
The following is a list of stadiums in South Africa, ordered by capacity. Currently all stadiums with a capacity of 30,000 or more are included.
